column5: Well the deed is dunn!  THE boat is put away for the winter and plans for next years outings are in the works. I hope to make it up too lakeair for the JUNE G2G WEEKEND . MY frist week will be at  HEY BAY in MAY and for my second week I hope to make it to lakeair for a week. Ending on the g2g weekend.  As for my other three week of holidays I am open and will be keeping my eyes on the board for other hot spot to try out. I may keep a week for the fall after seeing all those pictures from QUINTE  last week. MR.PIKE
